Content: Directorate of Psychological Operations at the request of the Centre for Army Vocational Training (CAVT) at Saliyawewa organized a special lecture on ‘Propagation of Military Literature’ at the CAVT auditorium on Sunday (8). Major Sugath Chaminda of the Directorate of Psychological Operations delivered the lecture for the benefit of novice recruits under training at the CAVT. Senior military Officers including Brigadier W.M.R.J.K Senarathna, Commandant CAVT, staff Officers and Other Ranks listened to the lecture.
